self.name: messages.sendScreenshotNotification
self.description: Notify the other user in a private chat that a screenshot of the chat was taken

arguments.name: replyToMsgId
arguments.description: ID of message that was screenshotted, can be 0

throws.description: The provided peer id is invalid
throws.name: PEER_ID_INVALID
